The Quranic researcher, who has the king of the heavens and the earth, is to notify the areas of their faith.And the Almighty said: And God is a witness and a promise to them, and a return to their torture; The knowledge of God has the right of his universal affairs for the ranks of the majesty and the beauty of all the things that are in its entirety of the two parties of the two parties that calls for the sake of the reward Approval of that and the dignity in which the recitation is in which it comes in the generous name without the guerrilla.
